I grew up in Chile, between Viña del Mar and Santiago.
I studied for all my degrees at Universidad Adolfo Ibañez, first in engineering (bachelor and MSc in financial engineering), and then a PhD in Finance. Naturally, when not studying, I spend most of my weekends on the beach, lakes, and mountains.

Then I moved to the Netherlands to visit Erasmus University, Rotterdam School of Management, where I met [Silvana](https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/all/?fetchDeterministicClustersOnly=true&heroEntityKey=urn%3Ali%3Afsd_profile%3AACoAACGu0A8BTVhYKsjxXNev9F3G7RSjx5FnFtQ&keywords=silvana%20maas&origin=RICH_QUERY_SUGGESTION&position=0&searchId=3a224441-7ae7-4bba-802d-49f125baeba2&sid=v2R&spellCorrectionEnabled=false). In 2019 we moved together to Barcelona, and I started working at Universitat Pompeu Fabra.
